i think i konw the fix...it worked for me.
dont put it in Program Files(x86)\Grand Theft Auto IV - Episodes From Liberty city
put it in Program Files (x86)ROCKSTAR GAMES\Grand Theft Auto IV - Episodes From Liberty City
see the diffrence...not directly into program files(x86) but into program files(x86)\rockstar games

i had some error on 32 bit and now it works 
thanks!!!

Works perfect

Just do this steps
Instructions:
1. Install Games For Windows Live if you haven't already: http://www.microsoft.com/games/en-US/index.aspx
2. Download this release: http://thepiratebay.org/torrent/5496057/Grand.Theft.Auto.IV.Episodes.From.Liberty.City-ali213
3. Extract all the contents of that release to C:Program Files (x86)Rockstar GamesGrand Theft Auto IV - Episodes From Liberty City
4. Move all the contents of C:\Program Files (x86)\Rockstar Games\Grand Theft Auto IV - Episodes From Liberty City\EFLC to C:Program Files (x86)Rockstar GamesGrand Theft Auto IV - Episodes From Liberty City.
5. Copy the all the contents of this torrent to C:Program Files (x86)\Rockstar Games\Grand Theft Auto IV - Episodes From Liberty City
6. Double click "EFLC install.reg" and confirm that you want to add that to the registry.
7. Double click "LaunchEFLC.exe"
